short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension creates an Image-Subbuzz from online photo services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension creates an image subbuzz from the image services of Getty, Reuters, AP and Flickr.

You'll see a new "insert as subbuzz" button next to the image download button. Click on this new button and the image shall be posted to your BuzzFeed superposter tab. You should have exactly one opened superposter tab.
